1.0.name: wordpress/remove-n-disable
1.0.description:
This plugin has several options to disable/enable several links from wordpress dashboard, disable browser update warning, wordpress core update etc. This plugin's option will be found under settings named as R_n_D.

You can modify below options by using this plugin

Remove Wp Logo Remove About Link Remove Org Link Remove Documentation Link Remove support forum Link Remove Feedback Link Remove View Site Link Remove Footer Version Remove Footer Text Disable Browser Upgrade Warning Disable Wordpress Update
